summary: Sonja the Barbarian is a Female follower found in Riften that is level 1 so that you have a helping hand throughout the game!
descriptionHtml:
Sonja the Barbarian is a follower found in Riften outside the marketplace. She is based off Red Sonja, I am working towards changing the armor.

*Unpack This .zip into C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data *
Suggested Mods:
Better Females by Bella-
 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812
XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement- 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2356
author: JZHero
